entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • setting GenerateAssemblyInfo to false [csproj] disables EnablePreviewFeatures with no warning [analyser?] #24700

Closed

  • testhost exited with error: Failed to create CoreCLR, HRESULT: 0x80004005 #22828

PullRequests

Created

  • Restrict default file inclusion of Windows App SDK files to only happen if specific properties are set #24704
  • Revert "deploy common roslyn assemblies used by multiple dotnet tools" #24701
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Publish support in SDK for Native Aot Application #24693
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Revert "deploy common roslyn assemblies used by multiple dotnet tools" #24702
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1699113 #24673
    Area-Infrastructure
